name: DeepSight
description: This app supports hunting and a variety of investigative actions, in addition to report ingestion, from the Accenture DeepSight Intelligence cyber security service

max_reports_first_ingestion.description: Maximum latest reports to poll first time

download_report.description: Download report to vault if available

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity

actions.verbose:
For the first poll, ingests the latest number of reports set in max_reports_first_ingestion. Subsequent polls ingest new reports. To ingest all current reports, set max_reports_first_ingestion to a number equal to or greater than the number of reports in DeepSight and set the poll interval large enough to allow all reports to be ingested. The poll interval can be adjusted after the first poll completes.

start_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 10 days

end_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is now

container_count.description: Maximum number of reports to ingest

actions.description: Look for information about a file

actions.verbose: It has been noticed that report availability from API might lag the Accenture DeepSight database.

download_report.description: Download PDF report to vault if available
